meanings.definition: Relying too much on someone or something for support or help.
meanings.sent1: The overdependent puppy followed its owner everywhere, never wanting to be alone.
meanings.sent2: She became overdependent on her phone for entertainment, forgetting how to enjoy other activities.
meanings.sent3: The overdependent plant relied on constant watering, refusing to grow without it.
meanings.sent4: His overdependent behavior towards his boss hindered his ability to make decisions independently.
meanings.sent5: The overdependent child clung to their parent's hand, afraid to explore on their own.

meanings.definition: Excessively dependent on others for emotional or financial support.
meanings.sent1: The overdependent student always sought reassurance from their classmates before making a decision.
meanings.sent2: She felt overdependent on her partner for happiness, forgetting her own self-worth.
meanings.sent3: The overdependent cat meowed loudly until its owner returned, demanding attention.
meanings.sent4: His overdependent nature on his friends led to a lack of self-confidence in social situations.
meanings.sent5: The overdependent sibling relied on their brother for every little task, never trying to do things on their own.
